title: ‘Opi-omi,’ musettes, sucker punches: 5 times fans (and dogs) have caused crashes at the Tour de France
content:
Saturday's crash is just the latest in a long history of over-eager fans and too-close spectators causing chaos on the Tour de France.

Read the full article at ‘Opi-omi,’ musettes, sucker punches: 5 times fans (and dogs) have caused crashes at the Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
